title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Art-Based Creative Leadership Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain ≥2 strategies for stimulating team creativity using artistic expression techniques (e.g., drawing, improvisation).
Learners can design organizational conflict management solutions by improving self-awareness ≥30% through arts-based experiences.
Learners can execute ≥1 innovative approach for real-world problem-solving by applying the artistic process (creation-critique-reconstruction).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
